message: Some time after Toue took us into custody...
Platinum Jail held its Special Celebration. Turns out this was another Toue experiment窶付he biggest one yet.
Stripped of their free will, the citizens of Midorijima became obedient puppets, bound to Toue's will.
The corporation soon bought up the entire island, then declared independence from Japan.
And now...
Though a small country, the unwavering unity of Midorijima's people is enough to terrify the rest of the world.
My true self restored, I rule the island at Toue's side.
Not that my face ever winds up in the news.
If Toue is the light, I am his shadow.
He takes care of the political bullshit, while I manipulate and destroy people's minds, bending them to our will.
It's an easy gig. I don't have to think about anything, just use my power.
Plus... I have quite the benefits package.
At the bottom of Oval Tower, deep underground, is a cell with a single occupant.
Peering through the thick bars, I see a man bound with chains, hanging his head, sitting against the wall.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Koujaku."
His shoulders twitch and he looks up at me.
Though his hair is tangled and his face is gaunt, I can see his muscles rippling, straining to break free.
He's nothing like he was, but I like this Koujaku better.
He's free now. Free to simply be.
I especially like the light in his eyes, hungry like a wild beast's.
All it takes is one look to get my blood pumping.
I undo the lock and slip inside the cell. My heart is pounding with anticipation.
Stepping closer, I breathe an admiring sigh.
On his back, fierce and wild, blooms a field of vibrant flowers.
They're beautiful. So, so beautiful.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Were you a good boy today?"
He looks up at me, drooling as he growls.

name: 紅雀
message: "Grrrr..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll take that as a yes."
His brow is knotted, lips pulled back. I shower them with kisses.
With what limited range of motion he possesses, Koujaku sinks his fangs into my arm.
Blood quickly soaks the thin shirt I'm wearing.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That hurts..."
My words come out as a moan. It doesn't hurt at all.
Even pain is pleasure now, when the source is my Koujaku.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's it..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Urgh..."
With his long tongue, Koujaku laps up the blood.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Aaah."
Desperate to relieve my own excitement, I help Koujaku out of his clothes.
This has become my daily ritual. My body is covered with bite marks as a result, but even those are precious to me.
I wrap my hand around Koujaku's firm member and whisper sweetly―

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm all yours, Koujaku. Just like you wanted."

name: 紅雀
message: "Unghh..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "We'll be together forever."
For as long as this island stands.
I'll never let you go.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Now... come here."
